name: Ogre Battleship
description: The appropriately named Ogre Battleship is a Tier 7 Battleship designed by the Umbra. Its Bloodlust ability grants it increased offensive capability the more times it is triggered as it is active.
tips-builds: Use a mix of Blight and Explosive Nova Missile, Ablative armor, Magnetic Collar and Harmonic Thrusters.
author: 137B201F8F7AD871
